last_episode_to_air.name: Rhyme It And They Will Come
last_episode_to_air.overview: The day of Dylan and Rebecca's launch party for their label is finally here! However, after a venue Rebecca had planned ends up being taken, the duo must find a way to secure a new venue for their big event before it's too late; Charlie and Viola contribute on their part to the label by opening up a mini diner at the house.

name: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
overview: Young Dylan’s grandmother decides to send him to live indefinitely with her affluent son’s family. The Wilson family household is soon turned upside down as lifestyles clash between aspiring hip hop star and his straight-laced cousins.

episodes.name: Imaginary Friends
episodes.overview: Young Dylan arrives at his relatives' home needing a place to live, but his streetwise swagger upends the conservative Wilson household.

episodes.name: Street Smart
episodes.overview: Yasmine’s celebrity client DJ Khaled visits, presenting Dylan with a golden opportunity to prove his rap credentials and score a record deal.

episodes.name: Chasing That Dream
episodes.overview: Dylan has trouble adjusting to the Wilson family’s rules, leading to confrontation with his uncle that makes him feel unwanted.

episodes.name: Plain Faces
episodes.overview: Dylan doesn’t want to attend school, and does whatever it takes to avoid going, including convincing little Charlie not to go, either.

episodes.name: The Enforcer
episodes.overview: On his first day at school, Dylan starts a classroom protest over having to wear uniforms.

episodes.name: Speechless
episodes.overview: The kids help Myles plan Yasmine’s big dinner at the house for her boss. While Myles struggles to write a speech in honor of his wife, the kids throw out the catered food and plan their own menu.

episodes.name: Flowers
episodes.overview: After failing to get approval to go to the school dance, Rebecca tells her date that she can’t go because her grandmother has died, a lie that leads to a series of misunderstandings within the family.

episodes.name: In Too Deep
episodes.overview: As Myles and Yasmine sort out the truth behind a lie that spun out control, Dylan helps them plan payback on Rebecca before she gets home.

episodes.name: Mother May I
episodes.overview: Dylan writes a serious rap about his mom, prompting Martin to read his diary to find out if he’s doing ok. Dylan catches him in the act, triggering an escalating run of each family member invading the others’ privacy.

episodes.name: Teachable Moments
episodes.overview: Rebecca is being bullied online, prompting Dylan to encourage Martin to respond to some of the posts. His posts are not anonymous, however, and the family must deal with the fallout.

episodes.name: Natural Beauty
episodes.overview: Dylan tries to help Charlie with his homework, but his unconventional style of doing his homework comes to a head with Dylan gets into a rap battle with their teacher.

episodes.name: Special Delivery
episodes.overview: Rebecca is babysitting Charlie and Dylan, but when a deliveryman arrives with a package from Dylan’s mom, Rebecca and Dylan fight over the rule about not opening the door.

episodes.name: The Rap Game
episodes.overview: The family can't get any peace while Dylan plays the drums all day and night, and everyone tries to convince him that he needs to give up his new instrument for good.

episodes.name: The gift
episodes.overview: Dylan has a dream about his mom returning to get him, and reveals that he doesn’t want to leave. This becomes a reality when Viola reveals that Dylan’s mom is back, and planning to take Dylan home with her.

episodes.name: Food for the Soul
episodes.overview: Dylan gets ready to return to Chicago with his mother when a change in the plan causes him to question their relationship and prompts the Wilson family to help him through this latest crisis.

episodes.name: My Fair Charlie
episodes.overview: Charlie seeks Dylan's help when he has a crush on a girl, but Dylan's rap music-informed advice clashes with Rebecca's more feminist take on how Charlie should handle the situation.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Rappers
episodes.overview: When the school does a hip-hop version of Shakespeare, Dylan takes on another boy for the lead role; after only being cast as an understudy, Dylan is determined to outshine his rival and nab the part for himself.

episodes.name: Einsteins
episodes.overview: A lucky guess in math class lands Dylan on the Mathlete squad, where his teammate, Rebecca, is worried that he will hurt their chances in the upcoming regional competition.

episodes.name: Who Done Done It?
episodes.overview: Dylan plays detective after an expensive vase is broken in the house, but no one admits guilt, and everyone is a suspect.

episodes.name: Partners In Rhyme
episodes.overview: Dylan has a new track that he's sure will get some attention, but he needs a female vocalist for the hook and after using Rebecca for the part, he can't contain his jealousy when she starts getting more attention than him.

episodes.name: Coppin' Magnitudes
episodes.overview: Myles joins Dylan in camping out overnight for a chance to appear in a music video and score new sneakers, but a series of mishaps threatens Dylan's ability to actually get the shoes.

episodes.name: Oceans 11am
episodes.overview: When a valuable collectible that Rebecca and Charlie sneak into school is confiscated by the principal, Dylan must help his cousins pull off an elaborate heist to retrieve it before Myles realizes it's missing.

episodes.name: Cruisin' for a Bruisin
episodes.overview: Rebecca wants to use her new scooter to make social media posts, and Dylan wants to use it in a rap video, but both need to hide it from their parents if they want to keep it.

episodes.name: Squirrel Scouts and Seaweed Masks
episodes.overview: Accidentally trapped in the garage with Myles, Dylan puts his street smarts to the test against Charlie's scout smarts to see who can find a way out.

episodes.name: Charlie the Bad Boy
episodes.overview: Charlie is tempted to change his clean reputation when a group of school vandals invites him into their clique, forcing Dylan to try to change Charlie's mind; Rebecca and Bethany protest when they are not allowed on the football team.

episodes.name: Dylan and Rebecca vs. Alcatraz
episodes.overview: Rebecca and Dylan, desperate to sneak out of the house, plot how to get past Viola, nicknamed "Alcatraz" because no one has ever escaped on her watch; Charlie prepares a report on a historical person who inspires him.

episodes.name: So Many Lessons
episodes.overview: Dylan insists that baseball isn't another one of his fleeting interests, but when he decides he wants to quit after a few days, he has to hide it from the family; Rebecca struggles to choose something for her class time capsule.

episodes.name: Haunted Halls
episodes.overview: Dylan and Charlie decorate the school for a Halloween party and discover that the creepy janitor might be keeping a spooky secret; Rebecca and Bethany can't agree on a two-person costume for trick-or-treating.

episodes.name: Dylan vs. Mystery X
episodes.overview: Dylan's popularity skyrockets when he engages in an online rap battle, but the pressure to settle the beef at school creates a new set of problems; Rebecca's upcoming solo at church spurs Yasmine and Viola to offer fashion advice.

episodes.name: Bunk Hate
episodes.overview: Rebecca's assignment to study animals in the wild leads her to observe Dylan and Charlie as they battle for suprema

episodes.name: Snitches Get Stitches
episodes.overview: Blamed for a classmate's prank, Dylan must decide whether to reveal the real culprit, or suffer the consequences for taking the fall; Charlie and Rebecca think the family is being evicted from their home.

episodes.name: Taking Credit
episodes.overview: Hoping to be a baller in his latest music video, Dylan secures a credit card and starts ordering everything he needs to look the part, but after getting Rebecca and Charlie on board, the kids learn that credit card debt has to be paid back.

episodes.name: Waiting for Santa
episodes.overview: The family tries to make Dylan's first Christmas away from home special, but goes overboard trying to recreate his favorite traditions; the kids panic when they realize they don't have gifts for their parents.

episodes.name: Rap Dreams Do Come True
episodes.overview: Dylan discovers his new substitute teacher is a former rap star, and Dylan plots to get him back on top; after successfully reviving the former star's profile, Dylan finds that own dream remains out of reach.

episodes.name: Friday the Juneteenth
episodes.overview: With the annual Juneteenth parade on the horizon, Dylan and Rebecca find themselves at odds over the float parade; Myles and Yasmine utilize Charlie's culinary skills to bake pies for Viola's church social.

episodes.name: How to Catch a Scammer
episodes.overview: When Lay Lay and Dylan get duped into buying fake designer clothing, they team up to track down the scammer.

episodes.name: Dylan Blows Up
episodes.overview: Dylan becomes an egomaniac when he thinks his latest song is a number one hit in Nigeria; Yasmine enlists Rebecca to direct a commercial for her business.

episodes.name: Dylan & Charlie's Day Off
episodes.overview: Faking being sick to stay home from school, Dylan and Charlie plan a day of fun, but Rebecca tries to expose their lie.

episodes.name: The Gift Grift
episodes.overview: After secretly opening his birthday gift from Myles and Yasmine early, Dylan must invent a cover up when he accidentally destroys it; the family plans to be the top seller at the neighborhood yard sale by way of Charlie's culinary skills.

episodes.name: Power Trippin
episodes.overview: Appointed hall monitor, Dylan finds the job more than he bargained for; with their parents working evenings, Rebecca and Charlie must prove they can hold down household responsibilities by themselves.

episodes.name: Fame, Blame & Video Games
episodes.overview: Dylan and Rebecca form an unlikely team to win a school gaming competition; Charlie is tasked with painting a portrait of Myles and Yasmine.

episodes.name: Saturday School
episodes.overview: After falling asleep in class due to staying up late for a family tradition with Myles, Dylan is forced into Saturday detention; the family deals with Viola's competitive nature on game day.

episodes.name: On the Hunt for Fun
episodes.overview: After Myles and Yasmine enforce a no-technology policy into place, Dylan, Rebecca and Charlie find themselves on a treasure hunt in order to retrieve their gadgets.

episodes.name: The Chi Ones
episodes.overview: After his old rap group from Chicago pays him a visit, Dylan must decide between the past and his future as a solo artist; Rebecca puts Myles and Yasmine on a strict diet regimen.

episodes.name: Renaissance Man
episodes.overview: When Dylan is assigned to write a history report for school, he travels back in time to the Harlem Renaissance.

episodes.name: Reality Bites
episodes.overview: Dylan and Charlie cause chaos among the family in an attempt to create a dramatic audition tape for a reality TV show; Rebecca and Bethany teach Dylan a lesson about compromising his values.

episodes.name: A Corsage with Your Sabotage
episodes.overview: As the school dance approaches, Dylan and Tara work together after they realize they have the same nefarious hidden agenda; Yasmine becomes overly protective of Charlie when the family supports his decorating efforts.

episodes.name: Curse this Verse
episodes.overview: Viola and Dylan work on his de-stressing skills so that he can reconnect with his rapping abilities; Yasmine reluctantly seeks help from Charlie for her anniversary plans.

episodes.name: Principal Party Pooper
episodes.overview: Rebecca offers anonymous advice to her peers and a superior but goes further than is appropriate; Myles and Yasmine struggle to be partners until Charlie leads them with his advice.

episodes.name: Burning After Reading
episodes.overview: Dylan must make amends after he invades the privacy and violates the trust of a classmate; Yasmine and Myles are disappointed when Charlie uncovers an awful truth.

episodes.name: Who’s the Boss
episodes.overview: Charlie gets his first job but must stand up for himself in order to keep it; Rebecca realizes that Tracee may be more manipulative than she appears.

episodes.name: The GOAT
episodes.overview: Charlie's habit of listening to other people's private conversations goes wrong after he informs Yasmine and Miles of Dylan's new life plan; Rebecca learns the meaning for true friendship and accepting oneself.

episodes.name: Between a Roach and a Hard Place
episodes.overview: When he's hired to perform his hit viral song for a commercial, Dylan's artistic integrity is tested; Charlie must give a school presentation on someone in his family tree.

episodes.name: Dylan's Villain
episodes.overview: Dylan confronts 'Dylon' -- a poor imitation of himself with whom Bethany is smitten; Myles tries to help Yasmine fix their patio.

episodes.name: Build It And They Will Flow
episodes.overview: Dylan and Rebecca unexpectedly play the role of magician's assistant, while determined to return a cash-filled lock box to its rightful owner.

episodes.name: No Camping, No Problem
episodes.overview: Viola teaches Rebecca and Dylan a lesson in sabotage. Myles introduces the family to camping.

episodes.name: Wilson vs. Wilson
episodes.overview: Charlie enlists Dylan to help run his campaign for school ambassador against their mutual enemy Ace.

episodes.name: Artificial Intelligence
episodes.overview: While receiving tutoring from Bethany, Dylan's decision to cheat leads to sabotaging Bethany's class presentation.

episodes.name: So Fresh, So Clean
episodes.overview: Myles worries he's losing the bond with Charlie as Charlie develops new interests that don't include Myles. Dylan and Rebecca learn about the financial woes of running their own record label.

episodes.name: Dancing with the Sons
episodes.overview: Charlie convinces Dylan to stand-in for him in this year's Mother-Son dance leading to surprising consequences.

episodes.name: The Wilson Family
episodes.overview: It's Halloween, and the Wilsons take the holiday very seriously; Dylan must deal with his family dressed up for Halloween when the heads of a hot brand stop by to interview him as a potential spokesperson, but while trying to do so, he experiences a series of fright, horror and trauma.

episodes.name: Best Friends For-Never
episodes.overview: Dylan tries to mend a rift between Rebecca and Bethany only to make matters worse.

episodes.name: Picture Perfect
episodes.overview: Dylan tries to convince local street artists to create a mural featuring himself resulting in widespread chaos.

episodes.name: Deliver Us From Viola
episodes.overview: Dylan and Rebecca hatch up a plan to set Viola up on a date with the delivery man.

episodes.name: Hot Takes
episodes.overview: Dylan and Rebecca secure a guest spot on a popular hot-wing eating talk show to promote their new record label, but when they get embarrassed on live TV and become the laughingstock of the school, they turn to Charlie to help get them back on the show; Myles and Viola compete against each other to see who is the most "adventurous", even if it means getting a risky tattoo.

episodes.name: Model Behavior
episodes.overview: After Rebecca is chosen as a model for a hot clothing boutique, Dylan and Bethany will do anything to get her back; a reluctant Charlie decides to let Myles and Yasmine take care of his baby egg for his class project.

episodes.name: Boyz to Men
episodes.overview: Deciding they aren't babies anymore, Dylan and Charlie turn their bedroom into a man cave... until they end up with a rodent problem; Rebecca helps Myles co-manage his fantasy basketball team, but the two soon find themselves at odds.

episodes.name: What's Poppin'
episodes.overview: When Rebecca embarks on a mission to sell Fun Goo, Dylan accidentally ruins all of her products, causing sabotage to her master plan to leave for Houston for an academic championship. Now Dylan and Rebecca have to make a new batch of goo, but when Dylan notices something is up with Rebecca, he soon learns the real reason why; Charlie goes to drastic lengths to avoid being embarrassed when he decides to join Yasmine's Bible club to impress a girl.

episodes.name: A Very Delivery Van Christmas
episodes.overview: Dylan and Charlie's holiday spirit comes to a halt when they are grounded and are trapped in a delivery van on Christmas Eve; Yasmine becomes the student after trying to teach Rebecca a lesson about gratitude.

episodes.name: Sleepover Showdown
episodes.overview: In an epic sleepover showdown, the girls and boys engage in a fierce battle to claim dominance over the living room; Myles and Yasmine attempt to have an entire night of fun to themselves in the garage, until Viola crashes the party.

episodes.name: Mo Viral, Mo Problems
episodes.overview: After Charlie's video of Dylan performing a dance goes viral, Dylan must recover his reputation at school; Myles and Yasmine use coupons to trick Rebecca into doing house chores, until Viola and Rebecca get the upper hand.

episodes.name: Rhyme It And They Will Come
episodes.overview: The day of Dylan and Rebecca's launch party for their label is finally here! However, after a venue Rebecca had planned ends up being taken, the duo must find a way to secure a new venue for their big event before it's too late; Charlie and Viola contribute on their part to the label by opening up a mini diner at the house.
